titles.title: TokenAudit Platform
titles.description: Ethereum TokenAudit Platform Developed a full-featured web application for analyzing Ethereum tokens using Next.js, TypeScript, and MongoDB. Engineered an automated system with over 15 specialized bots (such as TTFBot and SafeAnalyzerBot) to evaluate token security and risk factors. Integrated live Ethereum blockchain data for real-time token analysis. Optimized API performance and database queries for high scalability and speed. Designed a responsive, user-friendly interface ensuring seamless user experience.

titles.title: FRACKING
titles.description: Built an interactive website for the FRACKING Trump meme coin using Next.js, TypeScript, and MongoDB. Developed a gamified airdrop system, where users earn rewards by interacting with themed elements. Ensured backend performance with optimized MongoDB handling and smooth scalability. Delivered a high-performance, responsive design for all devices.

titles.title: AI-Powered Marketing Chatbot Platform
titles.description:
Created a dynamic platform featuring three AI agents that assist users with marketing advice through live chat.
Integrated real-time form generation, automatically capturing user input during conversations and storing it in the database.
Focused on delivering a smooth, real-time user experience with efficient backend operations. With ElizaOS.

titles.title: AI Agent Generator Platform
titles.description:
Developed a web application that allows users to generate and download custom AI agents based on their specific needs.
Designed an intuitive interface where users input configurations to dynamically create personalized agents.
Implemented a backend system that builds the agent logic and packages it for seamless download and deployment.
Focused on scalability, performance, and ensuring the generated agents are optimized for real-world tasks.
Delivered a user-friendly and responsive design, making the process smooth from input to download.

titles.title: Signal Advertising System with AI & ElizaOS
titles.description:
Developed an automated advertising system for Ethereum tokens using AI and ElizaOS.
Analyzed real-time token data to generate custom, engaging promotional content based on market signals.
Automated content creation and posting to Twitter, boosting token visibility and user engagement.
Leveraged machine learning to continuously optimize message relevance and performance based on user interactions and feedback.

body.raw:
Collaborated with a specialized team to develop an advanced **Ethereum trading bot** fully integrated with **Telegram**, designed for seamless and automated trading operations.

##### Key Features:
- **Auto Buy** ‚Äì Automatically execute buy orders based on real-time signals.
- **Take Profit** ‚Äì Secure profits at predefined target levels.
- **Custom Take Profit** ‚Äì Users can set personalized take profit strategies.
- **Auto Snipe** ‚Äì Instantly detect and snipe newly launched tokens.
- **Transaction Speed Control** ‚Äì Adjust gas fees to prioritize transaction speed.
- **Anti-Rug Protection** ‚Äì Built-in safety mechanisms to detect and avoid rug pulls.
- **Remove Liquidity Tokens from Tracking** ‚Äì Exclude specific tokens from liquidity tracking.

##### Highlights:
- Optimized for speed and security to ensure rapid, reliable, and safe transactions through **Telegram**.
- Designed intuitive user commands and workflows, making advanced DeFi trading simple and accessible.
- Integrated with the **Ethereum blockchain** to monitor live mempool data and execute trades in real-time.
body.html:
Collaborated with a specialized team to develop an advanced Ethereum trading bot fully integrated with Telegram, designed for seamless and automated trading operations.

Key Features:
  • Auto Buy ‚Äì Automatically execute buy orders based on real-time signals.
  • Take Profit ‚Äì Secure profits at predefined target levels.
  • Custom Take Profit ‚Äì Users can set personalized take profit strategies.
  • Auto Snipe ‚Äì Instantly detect and snipe newly launched tokens.
  • Transaction Speed Control ‚Äì Adjust gas fees to prioritize transaction speed.
  • Anti-Rug Protection ‚Äì Built-in safety mechanisms to detect and avoid rug pulls.
  • Remove Liquidity Tokens from Tracking ‚Äì Exclude specific tokens from liquidity tracking.
Highlights:
  • Optimized for speed and security to ensure rapid, reliable, and safe transactions through Telegram.
  • Designed intuitive user commands and workflows, making advanced DeFi trading simple and accessible.
  • Integrated with the Ethereum blockchain to monitor live mempool data and execute trades in real-time.
